job_title:
ImEX Systems is an industry leader in the collision repair software industry. Located in Vancouver, BC, we have been creating software that helps our clients run their business better for 30 years. We have recently launched a new web based version of our software and are rapidly expanding in Western Canada and the United States.

We are seeking a Senior Full Stack Developer/Team Lead to lead our team and products. You will be responsible for overseeing the entire software development process, from conceptualization to deployment of our application. You should be a hands-on leader with a strong background in both front-end and back-end development and the ability to handle significant portions of the development process independently. We use a PERN (Postgres, Express, React, Node) stack for an enterprise SaaS application with a rapidly growing user base.

You are:
An authentic human
Driven to succeed
An expert problem solver
Passionate about technology
Motivated by exceptional results
Someone who cares about your clients
Looking to add more value than just code

You will:
Lead the development of scalable and robust web and mobile applications using modern technologies and best practices.
Design and implement product features with input from business analysts and clients.
Collaborate with the team to define the architecture, technical specifications, and requirements of application.
Ensure high-quality code through code reviews, testing, and continuous integration.
Create the structures and processes required to grow the development team.
Maintain thorough technical documentation for the application and development processes.
Provide inputs to the product roadmap based on emerging technologies, trends and practices.
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues in collaboration with the team.

Requirements:
Post-secondary education in Computer Science, Software Development, Computer Engineering or a related field.
Seven years of experience in full stack development and distributed systems.
Demonstrated experience and deep expertise in software integrations and implementations.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate, build and manage relationships with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
Strong and innovated problem-solving abilities with a strategic mindset.
Experience integrating front and back ends of web applications while considering issues such as scalability and security.
Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously.


Languages: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, GraphQL
Programming/Frameworks: React, Redux, React-Native, Node, Express, Hasura
Containerization: Docker
AWS: ECS, RDS, EC2, S3, Elastic Beanstalk
Databases: Postgres
Testing: Cypress or equivalent frameworks
Project Management/Version Control: JIRA, Bitbucket, Git

This is a fully remote position that allows for flexible working hours within reason.

job_description:
Responsibilities

Development the Software Modules required by MOH and MLTC
Identify the GAPs in the existing Fiscal IQ system and identify best entry points to create Modules for MOH and MLTC
Design and development
Prepare the remediation plan to address the gaps
R&D for solutions proposal to rewrite/migrate onto Azure Cloud
Support the migration of the Fiscal IQ instances from KDC to GDC to meet the timelines of the Kingston Data Center Migration (CAJ-KDC) project
Support the data migration requirements of the PBF project
Maintenance, support, and provide operational Warranty
Provide maintenance and support
Provide documentation and knowledge transfer to FTE

Skills

Experience and Skill Set Requirements Solution Design Experience 10+ years of experience in the following:

Designing and developing large, complex, provincial level financial planning, budgeting, and business performance management system using Dot Net Framework, ASP.Net, Web Form, MVC, and using DevExpress component
Designing and developing business reporting using Crystal Reports, SQL Server Reporting Services, Power BI
Designing and developing mobile solutions using Azure Power Platform: Power Apps, Power Flow, Power Automate, Power BI
Knowledge of Cosmos DB, Node.JS, Express, React
UI/UX Design
Knowledge of WCAG 2.1 or AODA
Working experience in the following:
Creating system requirements and design specifications in tools such as Azure Boards, Azure DevOps
Building enterprise level software automation process using CI/CD pipelines, Tool Chains 40 points Technical Experience / Knowledge Areas 10+ years of experience in the following:
Hands-on ASP.Net Web Form, MVC development experience, install and configure MS IIS, Dot Net Framework, SQL Server environments
Hands-on experience with relational database design and development in MS SQL Server environment
Designing and developing RESTful web services, JSON and XML
Post-implementation support
Designing and developing user authentication using MS Active Directory, online or within corporate domain
Experience with Cloud Platform using PaaS, such as Docker, Kubernetes, Azure Dynamics, Node.JS, Cosmos DB

25 points Management and Communication Skills

Experience leading a team of developers, assigning tasks, mentoring junior developers, coordinating components for successful delivery
Excellent analytical, trouble-shooting, problem-solving and decision-making skills
Conducting research and assessment of options for technical design issues
Contributing to design/development of project plans, including work breakdown and resource plans
Verbal and written communications skills
Interpersonal and negotiation skills
A team player with a track record for meeting deadlines
Experience with the projects related to business critical environments and operations 15 points Project Management Skills

10+ years of experience in the following:

Continuous deployment methods and procedures
Agile methodologies for the analysis, design, development and implementation of applications in large complex environments
Knowledge and understanding of object-oriented analysis and design techniques
Knowledge of integration of complex systems and interoperability between complex systems 15 points Public Sector Experience
Demonstrated knowledge and experience with Public Sector governance methodologies (e.g. UPM, architecture gating)
Demonstrated understanding of Public Sector/ministries I&IT strategies, plans, policies, directives, best practices and standards to ensure compliance in the development, co-ordination and implementation of projects 5 points

Must Haves

10+ years of experience in the following:

Hands-on ASP.Net Web Form, MVC development experience, install and configure MS IIS, Dot Net Framework, SQL Server environments
Hands-on experience with relational database design and development in an MS SQL Server environment
Designing and developing RESTful web services, JSON and XML

Must-Have - Public Sector Exp. In finance
